titles.title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct an assessment of the responsibilities, workload, and vacancy rates of suicide prevention coordinators of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
Support for Suicide Prevention Coordinators Act
Support for Suicide Prevention Coordinators Act
Support for Suicide Prevention Coordinators Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Support for Suicide Prevention Coordinators Act
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to report on the responsibilities, workload, training, and vacancy rates of suicide prevention coordinators at the Department of Veterans Affairs.
